response.overview: In 1963 A brilliant FBI Analyst, Mike Hampton actively operating under J Edgar Hoover Cointelpro program is charged with homicide & targeted as a fugitive by the bureau. Against all odds, Mike sets out to prove his innocence. In an unfortunate turn of events, he's later decommissioned by the Justice Department, given a new moniker evolving into a clandestine spy converting to DeLorean Chase. Under his new alias, DeLorean obsessively monitors both the FBI, CIA & Mafia activities with surmountable intel & evidence on government corruption, global espionage and exposing classified operations to eliminate the influence of communism in the United States leading to crimes committed against humanity for control of political propaganda & profit.
response.title: Messiah's Cointelpro

results.name: Messiah-s Cointelpro Trailer Final with Logo.mov
